extension.description: Asynchronous Google Analytics allows for a faster loading Google Analytics code and tracking. Read the documentation at: http://pbwebdev.com/blog/asynchronous-google-analytics-plugin-for-joomla for more information

field.name: code
field.label: Google Analytics Web Property ID.
field.description: e.g. UA-12345-67. This code can be found in your Google Analytics account. Your site will not be tracked unless this code is entered.

field.name: domain
field.label: Domain
field.description: Please enter in the domain name that you are tracking. e.g pbwebdev.com

field.name: verify
field.label: Webmaster tools verification
field.description: Please enter the verification code from Google webmaster tools.
